name: GetInvoice
description: Returns all the details of an invoice by its ID.
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api` with functionality `Invoices:View`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

B.name: ID
B.description: This is the ID of a `Invoice`

D.name: Code
D.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

D.name: Message
D.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

D.name: RequestID
D.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

D.name: Type
D.description: A short description of the error type.

H.name: ID
H.description: This is the ID of a `InvoiceDisputeResolveAction`

G.name: ID
G.description: This is the ID of a `InvoiceDispute`

G.name: ReasonID
G.description: This is the ID of a `InvoiceDisputeReason`

F.name: ID
F.description: This is the ID of a `InvoiceAdditionalAmount`

N.name: ID
N.description: This is the ID of a `OrderLine`

N.name: OrderID
N.description: This is the ID of a `Order`

N.name: ProductID
N.description: This is the ID of a `Product`

N.name: Type
N.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - NormalProduct
* `1` - Discount
* `2` - ExtraCosts
* `5` - ShippingCosts
* `6` - ReturnCosts
* `7` - PriceCorrection
* `8` - Service
* `9` - GiftWrappingCosts
* `10` - DownPayment

P.name: BackendID
P.description: This is the ID of a `Shipment`

P.name: ID
P.description: This is the ID of a `Shipment`

O.name: ID
O.description: This is the ID of a `ShipmentLine`

M.name: AmountToBeDisputed
M.description: The amount that has to be resolved with disputes: ExpectedTotalAmountInTax - TotalAmountInTax - Disputes

M.name: ID
M.description: This is the ID of a `InvoiceLine`

Q.name: ShipmentBackendID
Q.description: This is the ID of a `Shipment`

Q.name: ShipmentID
Q.description: This is the ID of a `Shipment`

E.name: CreditorOrganizationUnitCountryID
E.description:
This is the ID of a `Country`

This string must be between 2 (incl) and 2 (incl) characters long.

E.name: CreditorOrganizationUnitID
E.description: This is the ID of a `OrganizationUnit`

E.name: CreditorOrganizationUnitLanguageID
E.description: This is the ID of a `Language`

E.name: DebtorOrganizationUnitID
E.description: This is the ID of a `OrganizationUnit`

E.name: DisputeAmounts
E.description: The Amount of the Disputes summed by Type

E.name: ExpectedSubTotalAmount
E.description: The ExpectedTotalAmount of the invoice minus the Disputes

E.name: ExpectedTotalAmount
E.description: The ExpectedTotalAmountInTax of all the InvoiceLines + AdditionalAmounts + ExpectedDisputes

E.name: ExpectedTotalAmountDifference
E.description: The difference between the TotalAmount and the ExpectedTotalAmount

E.name: ExpectedTotalQuantity
E.description: The ExpectedQuantity of all the InvoiceLines summed

E.name: ID
E.description: This is the ID of a `Invoice`

E.name: OriginalTotalAmount
E.description: The TotalAmount on the actual Invoice as provided by the Supplier

E.name: OriginalTotalAmountDifference
E.description: The difference between the TotalAmount and the OriginalTotalAmount

E.name: SubTotalAmount
E.description: The TotalAmount of the invoice minus the OriginalDisputes

E.name: TotalLineAmountInvoicedInTax
E.description: The TotalAmountInvoicedInTax of all the InvoiceLines summed

E.name: TotalQuantity
E.description: The Quantity of all the InvoiceLines summed

E.name: TotalQuantityDifference
E.description: The difference between TotalQuantity and ExpectedTotalQuantity

E.name: Type
E.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - Sales
* `1` - Purchase
* `2` - ControlDocument
* `3` - InitializationDocument
* `4` - ClosingDocument
* `5` - MonthlyControlDocument
* `6` - YearlyControlDocument
* `7` - IntegrityCheckDocument
* `8` - Offer

T.name: ExternalIDs
T.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

T.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
T.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

T.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
T.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
